article.title: Halverson Promoted, Assigned to TRADOC Posts
article.author: Beverly Schaeffer

tags.tag: U.S. Army Training and Doctrine Command

article.text: Maj. Gen. David D. Halverson, USA, has been nominated for appointment to the rank of lieutenant general and assignment as deputy commanding general/chief of staff, U.S. Army Training and Doctrine Command, Joint Base Langley-Eustis, Virginia.
